column4: perhaps i am going about this wrong, I am trying to mount a windows shared folder, I have installed smb, but can not mount the folder yet
any information would be greatly appreciated
http://www.ubuntu1501.com/2008/01/quick-dirty-samba-guide.html follow that guide, go to network and open the folder from there.
if that doesn't work, i don't know where else to send you :)
